questions.question: What were the main challenges the customer faced before using your product/service?
questions.description: List each challenge with a brief description of its impact

questions.question: What is the primary contact's full name?
questions.description: Name of the customer who will be quoted

questions.question: What is the customer's company name?
questions.description: Company name that will appear in the title

questions.question: What industry or sector does the company operate in?
questions.description: Helps readers understand the business context

questions.question: How would you describe the company size?
questions.description: Provides context for the scale of the business

questions.question: Where is the company headquartered?
questions.description: Adds geographic context to the story

questions.question: When is this case study being created?
questions.description: Used for version control and timeliness

questions.question: Who is preparing this case study?
Provide a 2-3 sentence summary of the customer's business, market position, and primary operations.
questions.description: Sets the stage for understanding their business context
questions.placeholder: Acme Logistics is a mid-sized freight company operating across the Midwest...

questions.question: What is the name of your product/service that was implemented?
questions.description: Primary solution that addressed the challenges

questions.question: Describe the solution components and how they were implemented.
questions.description: Include implementation steps, integration details, and usage context

questions.question: What measurable results and outcomes were achieved?
questions.description: Include both quantitative (%, time saved, revenue) and qualitative benefits

questions.question: Provide a short, positive quote from the customer about their experience.
questions.description: Authentic testimonial reflecting satisfaction and impact

questions.question: What are the key lessons learned or best practices other customers can apply?
